description: This fictional story took place in Europe around 1943. At that time Nazi secretly plotted a plan called Urda. Two agents, Janet and Erna received a task to investigate and prevent the completion of the secret plan.

tags.name: Historical
tags.description: Partly or completely set during a real period of world history.

tags.name: Military
tags.description: Centered around the life and activities of military personnel.

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: Full CGI
tags.description: Almost entirely created with computer-generated imagery.

name.native: グリムヒルト・クルツ
ジャネット・ハンター

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/romanovh) | [Hatena Blog](https://romanovhiga.hateblo.jp/) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/418723) | [note](https://note.com/romanovh/)

Romanov Higa, born Kazuhiro Higa, is one of the leading 3DCG animation artists in Japan. He graduated The University of Electro-Communications in Tokyo, Japan in 1996.

In 1997, his work "ONE DAY, SOME GIRL" won the Grand Prix at the 9th Amateur CG Animation Contest organized by Project Team DoGA. In 1999, he joined video game publisher Namco, but left only a few years later in 2001. He then started working freelance, mostly working on his own original movies. In recent years, his work has mostly been either storyboarding or within the art department of video games, and have notably been working on several titles in the *Pokémon* franchise.

**Non-Anime work:**
~!**Gungrave** (VG: PS2) - Movie Direction, Storyboard, Production (OP, ED, some interludes)
**Galaxy Angel** (VG: Windows, PS2, Xbox) - Movie Production (Beginning scene)
**Gungrave OD** (VG: PS2) - Movie Direction, Storyboard, Production (OP, ED, interludes)
**Princess Holiday ~Korogaru Ringotei Sen'ya Ichiya~** (VG: PS2) - Unit Director, Producer (Advertising movie)
**Tsuki wa Higashi ni Hi wa Nishi ni ~Operation Sanctuary~** (VG: Dreamcast, PS2) - Unit Director, Producer (Advertising movie)
**BALDR FORCE EXE** (VG: Dreamcast) - Direction, Storyboard, Production (Intermission movies)
**BALDR FORCE EXE** (VG: PS2) - Unit Director, Producer (Advertising movie)
**Tenkabito** (VG: PS2) - Storyboard (Interlude movie)
**BALDR BULLET EQUILIBRIUM** (VG: PS2) - Unit Director, Producer (Advertising movie)
**Pokémon Sun & Moon** (VG: 3DS) - Storyboard Design
**Pokémon Ultra Sun & Ultra Moon** (VG: 3DS) - Storyboard Design, Scenario Movie Graphics
**Pokémon Let's Go, Pikachu! & Let's Go, Eevee!** (VG: Switch) - Storyboard Design, Scenario Movie Graphic Design
**Pokémon Sword & Shield** (VG: Switch) - Movie Graphic Design
**New Pokémon Snap** (VG: Switch) - Movie Direction
**Pokémon Legends: Arceus** (VG: Switch) - Cinematic Design Team!~
